data.title: 'The Sintesa' Jimbaran - Bali
data.subtitle: Sintesa Hotels Group proudly to present the opening of ‘The Sintesa ‘ Jimbaran - Bali, a new concept of upscale hotel in Jimbaran and located on Bali’s southwestern coast is connecting between Jimbaran Bay and Clift (Bukit) of Jimbaran. The Sintesa Jimbaran Bali, designed for natural living with choices of the wellness and lifestyle activities and facilities to deliver ‘a best moment to stay‘.
data.text: The Sintesa Jimbaran – Bali is just 10 km south of the Bali Airport (Denpasar). 'The Sintesa' Jimbaran Bali is a short walk to many of Bali's most famous traditional beach - side Seafood Restaurants and is a close drive by hotel shuttle  to Cafés and Bars at Jimbaran Bay and Uluwatu. The Jimbaran region is also home to several world-class hotels and high end villas. Jimbaran is where we enjoy the majestic sunset emerged all year along the bay. Hotel’s location is conveniently positioned, is only 15 km away from vibrant area of Kuta and Nusa Dua. The Hotel is easily accessible to the main tourist quarter of Legian and Seminyak Beachs with its world- famous shopping and nightlife venues.

title: Sintesa | Destination
meta: The Sintesa Jimbaran Resort | Description for Destination
author: Fleava

data.title: Jimbaran, Bali
data.lead: Jimbaran Bay is one of iconic beaches in the South of Bali. This place is where we can find the majestic sunset emerged all year along the bay.
data.description_one: Brightly painted traditional Jukung fishing boats dot the white sand in the early morning, the fishermen are coming into shore with last night’s catch. Hire a fishing boat to take you out into the bay to give you a glimpse of the village way of life. Visit Kedonganan Fish Market, this daily market sells fresh seafood straight off the boats.
data.description_two: Taste the succulent catches of the day, freshly grilled over coconut husk barbecues when night falls and the beachside restaurants serve up. Dine under the starry skies to the sounds of the waves, the ultimate toes-in-the-sand dining experience.

data.title: The Sintesa Jimbaran Bali, 206 beautiful appointed guestrooms and suites are available in unique tiers of accommodation which include Superior Room, Deluxe Room, Family Rooms and our Suites Collection.
data.text: All room categories embody the finest attributes of contemporary Balinese and Javanese design and ultimately anticipate the needs of all our local & international travelers. This collection of accommodation provides the ultimate in crafted comfort, preferential services and privileges.

data.title: Superior Room
data.subtitle: Specially designed for a couple, honeymooner or friends. A home comfort of 35-sqm room, choice twin bed or king bed is an elegant heaven decoration with stylish furnishing and balcony.

data.title: Deluxe Room
data.subtitle: A modern appointed accommodation of 48-sqm room with spacious bedroom overlooking Jimbaran Hill. It is subtly blended between modern design and classy Balinese artwork.

data.title: Junior Suite Room
data.subtitle: Junior Suite is the hotel’s premier accommodation category that truly defines luxury. A 56-sqm accommodation that provide an elevated level of hospitality.

data.title: Suites Collection and Presidential Suite
data.heading: All rooms are facilitated with complimentary Wi-Fi, tea and coffee making facilities.

gallery.title: Executive Suite
gallery.text: The 100–sqm suite anticipates every conceivable need of the discerning global traveler, with the latest modern conveniences.

gallery.title: Sintesa Suite
gallery.text: The 97–sqm suites with highlight style, spaciousness and comfort, anticipating you every need.

gallery.text: The 100–sqm suite anticipates every conceivable need of the discerning global traveler, with the latest modern conveniences.

data.text: Room can accommodate up to 2 people. All rooms are facilitated with complimentary Wi-Fi, satellite TV Channel, tea and coffee making facilities, standing shower bath room with personal bath amenities. data.title: The exotic aromas, the stunning views. Angin Angin overlooks colorful gardens a perfect setting for family and friends to eat, or and just chill out.
data.text: Sipping your favorite cocktail or enjoy a glass of wine from the extensive beverage list created by one of Bali best cocktail & sommeliers, indulge in a gastronomic selection or nibble small bites of authentic Asian and Continental cuisine.

data.title: Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostru.
data.text_one: An authentic reminiscent full service bar and lounge built as an icon to the newly established ‘The Sintesa’ Jimbaran. Upon entering the hotel’s classic 1930s styled men’s Barbershop to furthest left corner of the room, inside the cloak room reveals a secret door to find the venue.
data.text_two: Old reclaimed wooden panels in dark lacquer, antique light fixtures, warm leather sofas, a fine pool table in one corner, a baby grand piano on the other and of course a bar complete with the finest collection of Single Malts, Whiskeys, a range of premium Vodkas and Branded Liquors.

data.title: To accomplish your healthy lifestyle we provide a healthy juice bar near the pool. If you really want to kick-start your health resolutions this year, making fresh juice is a part of a well-balanced, plant-based diet is an important tool for achieving good health.
data.text:
Juicing offers many life-enhancing health benefits including a faster, more efficient way to absorb immune boosting nutrients naturally found in fruits and vegetables. Drinking fresh juice can help us adopt healthier eating patterns.

For those of us who do not traditionally consume many fruits and vegetables, incorporating fresh juice can be a fun and different approach to increasing consumption of these important plant foods for improved health and wellness and reaching your weight loss goals.

data.title: Soon to be ready the most hip place in Jimbaran Area. Situated on the 7th floor of the building the indoor restaurant has the extension to the outdoor venue that has 360 views in Jimbaran. A magnificent sunset, a white sand of Jimbaran bay and the night lights of Benoa harbor.
data.text: Suitable for small parties, corporate gathering, birthdays, social events, we will caters the tailor made event to be a memorable one. The indoor restaurant will bring you the most distinctive menu for your culinary adventure. Selections of grill pairing with premium wine to enjoy under the starry night.  Mesmerize your romantic occasion with your love ones.

data.heading: Sintesa Wellness SPA offers a complete range of therapies experiences, luxurious, organic & authentic.

gallery.title: Spa Treatment
gallery.text: Sintesa Wellness SPA offers a complete range of therapies experiences, luxurious, organic & authentic. Designed and fully facilitated by the purest natural products, enter a world of harmony.

gallery.title: Wellness Activity
gallery.text: Designed and fully facilitated by the purest natural products, enter a world of harmony as you are treated to treatments created to nurture and inspire the soul.

gallery.title: The Gym
gallery.text: Fancy a refreshing workout instead? Your daily fitness regimes can be maintained at our state-of-the-art Fitness Centre, with the latest Gym equipment, featuring treadmills, cross trainers, rowing machines.

data.title: Sintesa Wellness SPA offers a complete range of therapies experiences, luxurious, organic & authentic. Designed and fully facilitated by the purest natural products, enter a world of harmony as you are treated to treatments created to nurture and inspire the soul.
data.text: Selected SPA packages recommendations with an array that can be tailor-made for individuals, groups, families and honeymooners`. Let our therapists soothe your body mind & muscles with a therapeutic Sintesa massage, reviving the senses with a gentle or firm rub with essential aromatherapy oils. Or simply indulge an experience our facial, waxing, manicure or pedicure services.

data.title: State-of-the-art gym completed with the latest equipment and skilled personal trainers. Yoga, Taichi & Aerobics classes for individuals or groups are also offered at scheduled times for all guests and members.
data.text: Wellness programs are becoming more widespread throughout the country. These programs range from simply offering information the benefit of a healthy life, to subsidized healthy and dietary menus, fitness, Yoga and gym during your stay at ‘The Sintesa’ Jimbaran.

data.title: For extra motivation, our equipment comes with personalized entertainment facilities. Located at first floor Fitness Studio open start from 06am - 09pm.
data.text: Fancy a refreshing workout instead? Your daily fitness regimes can be maintained at our state-of-the-art Fitness Centre, with the latest Gym equipment, featuring treadmills, cross trainers, rowing machines, bikes, stair machines and more.

data.title: All kids start out as scientists, constantly asking ‘Why? What’s that? How does it work?’ Kids experiences at The Sintesa Jimbaran tap into that innate curiosity by introducing our youngest guests to both the natural wonders and the rich cultural traditions of our family-friendly hotel,
data.text: Which also includes outdoor activities to keep youngsters active and inspired , With a diverse collection of vacation activities based on the four pillars of the program – water, land, environmental responsibility and culture – kids are swept away by everything from storytelling, to creative arts & crafts with a dedicated kids club crew at no additional charge to in-house guests.

data.title: Creating memorable events to the highest standard. We provide a full-service event management dedicated to quality and excellence.
data.text: Our first priority lies in gaining an in-depth understanding of how your business works, what you hope to achieve, and what we can do to deliver results that exceed all expectations. From Conference to a single evening celebration, birthdays, Christmas party, press events, Corporate festivals, we are able to create and deliver event projects which are stylish and innovative.

data.title: Exchange vows here. A dream venue for any Wedding Couple. The Sintesa Jimbaran Rooftop overlooks & Jimbaran Bay lush tropical fields, and the quaint architectural landscape of Bali.
data.text: Our dedicated wedding team delivers impeccable service to every bridal party couple, friends, and families, ensuring your wedding day runs smoothly with every detail taken care of. A blend of gracious Balinese hospitality, local expertise, and the professional know-how that will guarantee your wedding day to be magical and memorable experience you have always dreamed of.
